logic

Class ClientServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.ClientServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Server-side of the client, responsible for providing the uploading interface for other clients. Each new connection is handled by a ClientHandler.
    See Also:
    Client, ClientHandler
